div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p:
The Elliott County Board of Education regularly meets on the third Tuesday of each month at 6 pm at the Board of Education office. The Board has its regular meetings at 6 pm at school locations in November (Elliott County High School); January (Sandy Hook Elementary); February (Lakeside Elementary); and March (Isonville). We welcome the public at all meetings.
